quests.name: Raw Iridium
quests.description: This rare material seems to be found in the roof of the nether, although far too rare to be obtained reliably. The molecular transformer seems to be capable of producing the stuff though, if you can keep up with the power cost.

quests.name: Induction Power
quests.description: Many unique alloys and glasses can be made in an induction smelter. Some which you speculate may enable a new form of super fast data transfer.

quests.name: Highspeed Data Storage
quests.description: Finally a monumental breakthrough. With all the materials you have now experimented with you've discovered a method of near superluminal data transformation and transmission. An applied energistics network will help facilitate your future work.

quests.name: Molecular Transformation
quests.description: Building on the ideals of the Atomic reconstructor you've determined a much more power version. The molecular transformer seems capable of turning vast amounts of energy into useful materials.

quests.name: Arc to the Future
quests.description: Utilizing some of the newer metals you realize you can create powerful alloys if only you could generate enough heat and currently quickly enough. An Arc furnace should do this job nicely. Construct an arc furnace and the electrodes.

quests.name: Sunnarium
quests.description: Raw energy condensed into glowing stones from the nether yield a highly energetic form of light producing alloy. Sunnarium seems to have a highly versatile nature.

quests.name: Restonia
quests.description: A strange new material from atomic reconstruction of redstone, imagine what uses it may have...

quests.name: Orbital Mining Platform
quests.description: Uninspected mineral ores and dilithium are some of the most rare materials you can find. Your research as pointed you towards desining a new orbital mining platform that should be capable of extracting these and many other ores from a planetary space station in orbit around any planet. Create a space stationa nd orbital Mining platform to exploit these resources.

quests.name: Osmiridium
quests.description: By re-melting and then alloying osmium and iridium you can create a much more useful alloy. You'll need this is the creation of more advanced machinery.

quests.name: To The Moon
quests.description: You're going to need a more potent fuel source, theoretical models predict the existence of a dilithium crystaline structure. Unfortunately no one has located this on earth. Build a ship to take you to the moon to search for some!

quests.name: More human than human
quests.description: Bringing the full technological advancements at your disposal to bear on your own mortality, you have created a method of replacing parts of yourself with cybernetic improvements.

quests.name: Infusing Metals
quests.description: R&D has lead you to the development of an idea to infuse metals with energetic materials. By constructing an energetic infuser you believe you may be able to impart some qualities of carbon, redstone, diamond and perhaps others into metals directly.
